<!--
https://pypi.org/project/readme-generator/
-->

#### Installation
```bash
$ [sudo] pip install temp-untar
```

#### CLI
```bash
usage: temp-untar path
```

#### Examples
```bash
$ temp-untar file.tar.gz
/var/folders/t8/6x3s8whx545fr5dx07k81y_r0000gn/T/tmp.SSDkfeva
```
